p: Inclusion criteria were cases presented to the Queen's Veterinary School Hospital, Cambridge and a private referral centre for investigation of neurological signs in which CSF analysis was performed. In addition to standard laboratory processing, an additional slide was prepared by everting the spinal needle used to take the sample and standing on a plain glass slide, leaving for a minimum of one hour to allow sedimentation of cells, then processing with a rapid stain for cytological evaluation. Pleocytosis was defined as an average of >5 cells per 50x high power field.
